title: Gold 4 adc looking for sup duo to climb to plat!
body:
I had an 80% winrate with twitch over 50 games. Now that I'm in gold 4 I'm actually finding things a bit harder to climb just because people are so scared! Scared to take objectives, scared of teamfights. Scared of everything. I want to get to plat, or possibly diamond, but I need a little backup.



-Willing to improve and listen
-Not critical, focuses more on own game play than worrying about others mistakes
-Not toxic, if you're toxic to anyone, it will likely be the last game I play with you
-Not scared to initiate teamfights and go all in with me
-Good at peeling, keeping dive champions away from me
-Good awareness in team fights
-Map awareness
-Wards objectives at the right times
-Stays with me
-generally overall smart person who is well mannered and lovely (No angry people please)
-no laggy internet or crashy pc
-plays fairly regularly, mostly every night and some days

If this sounds like you and you're looking for an adc who is good mechanically then hit me up, add me and we'll give it a go :)

replies.body: hey mate I'm keen to play with you IGN is Weaterarachelz I'm Gold 5 Play janna as my main sup and can keep divers off you for a good period of time Hit me up

I would be interested having a couple of games together. Main supp, been playing since S2 but never got heavily into ranked.  Really would like to though and will take any advice i can get to help my gameplay. Im super chill too so if you dont mind helping me work on my game Ill certainly do what i can to get us up the ladder.

Hey dude, remember our little tit-for-tat in the other thread?

I'll carry you as support. Add me if your feelings weren't too hurt.
i am gold 4 too. i wanna climb up to platinum as well, but i am main at mid, can i join u? id:a survivor
Im a support main gold 3 ign:Clutchgamer

IGN : s0tirisss
Age : 21
Rank : Silver 2
Main Role : Support
Main Champions(not all of them in this acc) : Janna,Nami,Soraka,Braum,Nautilius,Morgana
